Reviews.Title: Great Value Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Ricky Dale Russ
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item for a trip to New York  and was impressed at the ease if use though am still figuring out some of the features.

Reviews.Title: Superb!
Reviews.Author: Akira Miyazaki
Reviews.Content: This type of digital cameras are not sold in my country Japan though I do not know why??? I think this camera is so useful especially when you travel abroad because it has Wi-Fi available and also when you travel alone because it has Multiview Compact Display which can show very vivid screen images and video movies, so you can take so many pictures and videos of yourself without asking anyone to take your pictures! Moreover this kit's price is rather reasonable, I think. So I love this camera!

ProductInfo.Features:
16.31MP 1/2.33" BSI CMOS Sensor with 25-125mm f/2.5-6.3 Lens
3.31" AMOLED Flip-Out Touchscreen
Full HD 1920 x 1080 30p Video
Gesture Shot for Self-Portraiture and Advanced In-Camera Photo Editing
Integrated Wireless Capabilities and Social Media Sharing and Auto Backup
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung MV900F Multiview Smart w/ Wi-Fi Digital Camera in White + 16GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
